20101207092736.714|20101207092738.143|CCO|           Great news!
20101207092738.143|20101207092739.571|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101207092739.571|20101207092741.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101207092741.000|20101207092742.250|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101207092742.250|20101207092743.500|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101207092743.500|20101207092744.750|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101207092744.750|20101207092746.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101207092746.000|20101207092747.250|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101207092747.250|20101207092748.500|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101207092748.500|20101207092749.750|CCO|       because it contains
20101207092749.750|20101207092751.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101207092751.000|20101207092752.250|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101207092752.250|20101207092753.500|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101207092753.500|20101207092754.750|CCO|        working together
20101207092754.750|20101207092756.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101207092756.000|20101207092757.250|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101207092757.250|20101207092758.500|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101207092758.500|20101207092759.750|CCO|        and should not be
20101207092759.750|20101207092801.000|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101207092801.000|20101207092802.250|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101207092802.250|20101207092803.500|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101207092803.500|20101207092804.750|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101207092804.750|20101207092806.000|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101207092806.000|20101207092807.250|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
